name: DHR Health
notes: Physician-owned for-profit system operating 5 hospitals in the Rio Grande Valley (main hospital, women's, behavioral, rehabilitation, children's). Serves over 280,000 patients annually.

name: Hillcrest Hospital Claremore
notes: Part of Hillcrest HealthCare System, a regional for-profit network of 7 hospitals in northeastern Oklahoma, owned by Ardent Health Services.

name: Scenic Mountain Medical Center
notes: Operated by Quorum Health, a for-profit system managing 12 community hospitals across 9 states focused on rural and community markets.

name: Carolina Pines Regional Medical Center
notes: Part of ScionHealth, a for-profit system operating approximately 15 community hospitals, created in 2021 as a spinoff from LifePoint Health.
